main event: A bright light in the sky was observed hovering and moving erratically over Thaxton, Virginia on January 2, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as being larger than a jet and making a humming sound.
The object was observed for several minutes before accelerating and disappearing.
There was no evidence of any physical disturbance or electrically conductive material found at the scene.
The report acknowledges the significance of the sighting and the need for further investigation.
The witness, Mr. A.R. Thaxton, reported the sighting to Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
